channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on English 5IB

item.title: What's a Cyber Crime
item.description: What’s a Cyber Crime Introduction to cyber crime The internet was born around 1960‟s where its access was limited to a few scientists, researchers and the Defense only. Initially computer criminals’ purpose was only meant to damage computers and related infrastructure. Around 1980‟s the trend changed from damaging the machine to causing a computer malfunction using a malicious code called virus. Till then the effect was not so widespread because Internet was only confined to defense setups, large international companies and research communities.
